title: The Night Before Christmas, 1914
description: A thought provoking adaptation of the classic poem, based upon the events of the Christmas Truce of 1914, in the trenches of the First World War. Tâ€™was the night before Christmas and across every trench, Not a soldier felt festive, neither British nor French. Whilst some of them whispered their solitary prayer, Others just hoped for an end to despair...
author: Richard J.  Davis
